original_text: And before them stood seventy men of the elders of the house of Israel, with Jaazaniah the son of Shaphan standing among them. Each had his censer in his hand, and the smoke of the cloud of incense went up.
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속의 장로 중 칠십 명이 그 앞에 섰으며 사반의 아들 야아사냐도 그 가운데에 섰고 각기 손에 향로를 들었는데 향연이 구름 같이 오르더라

sentences.original_text: And before them stood seventy men of the elders of the house of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 앞에 이스라엘 집 장로 칠십 명이 서 있었고

sentences.original_text: with Jaazaniah the son of Shaphan standing among them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중에는 사반의 아들 야아사냐가 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: Each had his censer in his hand
and the smoke of the cloud of incense went up.
